==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
Mr. Bai, who also went by the name Dr. Baifuzi falsely claimed to be [[Baizhu's master]]. [[Aunt Zhang]] was familiar with Mr. Bai's true identity. After losing a coin-tossing challenge to Kaeya and the Traveler, Mr. Bai is charged with defrauding [[Captain Wu]], along with many others before him, and is taken away by [[Jiayi]] and the [[Millelith]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Feathers Adrift in a Spring Breeze}}</ref>
